content:
EncryptionService Class

Definition

A service that allows server-side encryption to be used.

In this Article

public class EncryptionService
Inheritance
Object
EncryptionService

Constructors

EncryptionService()

Initializes a new instance of the EncryptionService class.
EncryptionService(Nullable<Boolean>, Nullable<DateTime>)

Initializes a new instance of the EncryptionService class.

Properties

Enabled

Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether or not the service encrypts the data as it is stored.
LastEnabledTime

Gets a rough estimate of the date/time when the encryption was last enabled by the user. Only returned when encryption is enabled. There might be some unencrypted blobs which were written after this time, as it is just a rough estimate.
